backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a new static image for the Combo Gift Sets card and listing related components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of numerous frontend files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles with extensive OKLCH color variables for light/dark themes and global element styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root component rendering the HomePage only.
frontend/src/components/BrandHeader.tsx: Sticky branded header with SafeImage logo and navigation buttons that scroll to page sections.
frontend/src/components/home/CuratedCate: Displays a grid of category cards using SafeImage and dynamic category image paths.
frontend/src/components/home/GuidedFlowP: Floating guided-flow assistant panel with open, close, and minimize controls.
frontend/src/components/home/HeroSection: Hero block with headline, CTAs, WhatsApp link, and SafeImage hero visuals.
frontend/src/components/home/HowItWorksS: Four-step process section with icons showing the gifting workflow.
frontend/src/components/home/MasterCatal: Catalogue CTA block offering view and download actions for the master catalogue PDF.
frontend/src/components/home/WhatsAppCTA: Displays a WhatsApp call‑to‑action section with a chat button and supporting text.
frontend/src/components/marketing/SafeIm: Image component that shows a loading placeholder and renders a fallback UI if the image fails.
frontend/src/config/pegasus.ts: Defines gifting categories, asset paths, configuration settings, and helpers for building WhatsApp links and messages.
frontend/src/features/guided-flow/Catego: Shows clickable category cards using predefined icons and invokes a callback on selection.
frontend/src/features/guided-flow/ChatMe: Displays system and user chat messages with styled bubbles and animations.
frontend/src/features/guided-flow/CTABut: Renders WhatsApp and catalogue action buttons, generating messages and handling view/download actions.
frontend/src/features/guided-flow/Guided: Core guided flow UI combining messages, quick replies, categories, and CTA buttons with scroll handling and restart logic.
frontend/src/features/guided-flow/QuickR: Renders a list of selectable quick‑reply buttons with labels and optional descriptions.
Type definitions for guided‑flow steps, messages, answers, and flow state.
frontend/src/features/guided-flow/useGui: Implements guided‑flow state management, step transitions, message creation, and intent/category resolution.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the current identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and authentication state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wrapper hook that exposes the backend actor and its fetching state for future backend integrations.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and theme variables for light and dark mode styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage layout with multiple marketing sections, footer, and guided flow panel.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, colors, fonts, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, features, requirements, and configuration for the ongoing update.
